author: sky.cactus
content: Need an `ethereum` GitHub organization admin to block this user from the organization repositories.  They are aggressively spamming the EIPs GitHub repository, and only organization admins can block.  cc <@642887713246150666> in case you happen to know who owns the `ethereum` organization on GitHub.

author: sky.cactus
content: Note: I have deleted most of their comments and reported many, but they keep making more.
